content:
TITLE: Basic Segmind Usage Example
DESCRIPTION: Basic example showing how to import, initialize and generate images using Kadinsky model
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import Kadinsky
model = Kadinsky(api_key)
img = model.generate(prompt)
img.show()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Segmind Package
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Segmind package using pip package manager
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install segmind
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: SD2.1 Model Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Stable Diffusion 2.1 for text-to-image generation
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import SD2_1
model = SD2_1(api_key)
img = model.generate(prompt)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: ControlNet Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using ControlNet for image-to-image generation with Stable Diffusion 1.5
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import ControlNet
model = ControlNet(api_key)
img = model.generate(prompt, imageUrl, option)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Kadinsky Model Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Kadinsky model for image generation
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import Kadinsky
model = Kadinsky(api_key)
img = model.generate(prompt)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: SAM Model Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Segment Anything Model (SAM) for image segmentation
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import SAM
model = SAM(api_key)
img = model.generate(imageUrl)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: SDOutpainting Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using SDOutpainting for image outpainting tasks
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import SDOutpainting
model = SDOutpainting(api_key)
img = model.generate(imageUrl)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Word2Img Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using Word2Img model for text-to-image generation
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import Word2Img
model = Word2Img(api_key)
img = model.generate(image, prompt)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: FaceSwap Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using FaceSwap model for face swapping in images
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import FaceSwap
model = FaceSwap(api_key)
img = model.generate(imageUrl, maskUrl)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: QR Generator Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of using QR Generator for creating stylized QR codes
SOURCE: https://github.com/segmind/segmind-py/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: python
CODE:
```
from segmind import QRGenerator
model = QRGenerator(api_key)
img = model.generate(prompt, qr_text)
```
